message: I propose a fair split, where I take the majority, but you still get a decent sum. Let's end this quickly.
Alice, your initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor. I'm proposing a more balanced split this time. Consider the declining value of the money - a deal now benefits us both.

I understand your desire for a more balanced split. I'm proposing a 50/50 split. This is a fair and equal division, and with the continuing inflation, it's in both our best interests to come to an agreement.
